sakai:title: Pooled Content - Me - Manager - All
sakai:shortDescription: Searches trough all the files where the current user is a manager.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "sortOn", "description" : "The name of the property you wish to sort on. This only has any affect if it is used with the sortOrder parameter. Default is jcr:score"}
{"name" : "sortOrder", "description" : "The order you wish to sort in. Either 'ascending' or 'descending'."}
